name: Keyboards Kanundrum
description:
Your keyboard has taken over your computer! To stop the keyboard, you must press the right buttons. How do you know what button is the right one? Well, the keyboard puts cryptic hints on the screen.

Keyboards are weird like that.

But be careful! Every time you press a key, your health goes down a little bit. After 100 key presses, it's game over!

This is a very early concept piece. Everything here (Yes, even the awful art) is a place holder for a hopefully better game. All I ask is for you to give it a spin and leave some feedback! Anything, from saying you don't like the color green to how this is a piece of garbage, helps me immensely!

Thank you!
